title: Jupyter Markdown Cell Input Schema
description: Input schema for Jupyter notebook markdown cells with attachment support

content.description: Markdown content from the notebook cell
content.default:
# Jupyter Markdown Cell

Markdown content from notebook cell...

show_note.description: Whether to show or hide the cell content

attachments.description: Cell attachments (images, files) as per nbformat specification

additionalProperties.description: Attachment data with MIME type keys

cell_index.description: Index of cell in original notebook
